snippet: Gallery owners in Chelsea expect to spend the next several weeks juggling meetings with restoration specialists, contractors and insurance adjusters.
abstract: Gallery owners in Chelsea face an uncertain future as they asses damage caused by Hurricane Sandy; most will not be able to reopen until mid-December, near the end of the gallery world’s prime selling season.
lead_paragraph: Gallery owners in Chelsea expect to spend the next several weeks juggling meetings with restoration specialists, contractors and insurance adjusters.

headline.seo: Chelsea Galleries Face Complexities of Art Triage
